errors.generic: There seems to be an error in Biometrics authentication

HomeScreen.whatCanDoBiometricsChanged?: What happens when Android keystore biometric is changed?
HomeScreen.detail-9: The Android keystore holds important information like private keys for identity proofs. When you change your biometrics, old keys are no longer safe. To keep things secure, we remove identity proofs signed by those old keys. You can simply download your identity proofs again, and they will be signed with the latest, safer keys.

OnboardingOverlay.stepOneText: Keep your digital credential with you at all times. To get started, add Cards to your profile.
OnboardingOverlay.stepTwoText: Once generated, Cards are safely stored on your mobile and can be renamed or shared at any time.
OnboardingOverlay.stepThreeText: Share and receive Cards switfly using your phone camera to scan QR codes.

ReceivedVcsTab.noReceivedVcsText: Tap on Request below to receive Card
